title: Stye
description: Styes are common and should clear up on their own within a week or two. They’re rarely a sign of anything serious but may be painful until they heal.

header.value: Styes are common and should clear up on their own within a week or two. They’re rarely a sign of anything serious but may be painful until they heal.

value.caption: A stye is a small, painful lump on or inside the eyelid or around the eye
value.alt: A small stye that appears as a lump on the upper eyelid just above the eyelash and is skin coloured with slight yellow tint

value.caption: The skin may be red, swollen and filled with yellow pus like a pimple
value.alt: An infected style on the rim of the upper eyelid, the stye is filled with yellow pus and the eyelid is red and sore

value.caption: Your eye may be red and watery but your vision should not be affected
value.alt: A stye just on the lower eyelid that has caused the lower eyelid to swell
